docs.snippet: The erotic box office hit "Fifty Shades of Grey" led the pack on Saturday for the annual Razzie Awards, "honoring" Hollywood's  worst films, while "Rocky" star Sylvester Stallone punched his way to a special Redeemer award for his Oscar-nominated ...
docs.lead_paragraph: The erotic box office hit "Fifty Shades of Grey" led the pack on Saturday for the annual Razzie Awards, "honoring" Hollywood's  worst films, while "Rocky" star Sylvester Stallone punched his way to a special Redeemer award for his Oscar-nominated turn in "Creed."

docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by writer and actor Colton Dunn describes his conflicted feelings at being called black Seth Rogen by casting director during so-called network showcase; reflects on his personal experience to shed light on controversy regarding lack of black nominees at Academy Awards.

docs.snippet: The 31st Independent Film Spirit Awards provided a clear rebuke to the less diverse Oscars, bestowing awards on "Beasts of No Nation" co-stars Idris Elba and Abraham Attah and "Tangerine" star Mya Taylor, making her the first transgender actress t...
docs.lead_paragraph: The 31st Independent Film Spirit Awards provided a clear rebuke to the less diverse Oscars, bestowing awards on "Beasts of No Nation" co-stars Idris Elba and Abraham Attah and "Tangerine" star Mya Taylor, making her the first transgender actress to win at the annual awards.
